name: EchoClip
description: Continuous background recording of your last 5 attempts. No buffering, writes straight to disk so your PC doesn't combust. Press the hotkey to save. Works or doesn't, who knows anymore.

enable-recording.name: Enable Recording
enable-recording.description: Turn recording on or off. It'll probably break either way.

bitrate.name: Video Bitrate (Mbps)
bitrate.description: Quality vs file size. i don't care anymore.

game-audio-volume.name: Game Audio Volume
game-audio-volume.description: How loud the game sounds. default: loud enough to mask my screaming.

use-hardware-encoding.name: Use Hardware Encoding
use-hardware-encoding.description: NVIDIA NVENC if available. pray it's installed.
